library.description: Making good-looking graphs shouldn't be hard. Morris.js is a lightweight library that uses jQuery and Raphaël to make drawing simple charts easy.
library.name: morris.js

library.description: gRaphaël’s goal is to help you create stunning charts on your website. It is based on Raphaël graphics library. Check out the demos to see static and interactive charts in action.
library.name: gRaphaël

library.description: Ico is a JavaScript graph library that uses Raphael to draw. This means it can draw graphs in multiple browsers (including IE).
library.name: Ico
